About Me

Professional Problem Solution for Web Development

Hi there! I'm a web developer who turns ideas into interactive reality using HTML, CSS, Tailwind and JavaScript. I make stunning interfaces with Tailwind CSS and build strong web apps with MERN Stack. My code isn't just text; it's a dance of structure, style, and dynamics. I specialize in making websites look great on any device, always staying up-to-date with the latest in web development. Let's create something awesome together!

Major Projects

MERN Projects and Experience

DR Store: An E-Commerce Store

DR Store is a modern E-Commerce web application built with cutting-edge technologies such as ReactJS, ExpressJS, NodeJS, MongoDB, and Redux Toolkit. With its sleek and user-friendly interface, Lesshopy provides an intuitive shopping experience for customers while offering powerful features for store owners to manage their products and orders efficiently.

Live Github

My Projects

Real Life Projects in Coding and Experience

Lesshopy

Lesshopy is a modern E-Commerce web application built with cutting-edge technologies such as ReactJS, ExpressJS, NodeJS, MongoDB, and Redux Toolkit. With its sleek and user-friendly interface, Lesshopy provides an intuitive shopping experience for customers while offering powerful features for store owners to manage their products and orders efficiently.

Visit Lesshopy

Gradient Generator

The Gradient Generator is a dynamic web application designed to empower users to effortlessly create stunning gradient backgrounds for their projects. Developed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, this tool offers an intuitive interface that allows users to customize gradients to their exact specifications with ease.

Visit Gradient Generator

Todo App

Simple Todo is a lightweight and intuitive todo list web app designed to help users organize their tasks effortlessly. Built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and I am using local storage to save all Todos, SimpleTodo offers a clean and user-friendly interface that prioritizes simplicity and functionality.

Visit DR Todos

Tic Tac Toe

Introducing my Tic Tac Toe game, a classic and timeless diversion brought to life with modern web technologies. With HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I've crafted a sleek and intuitive interface that allows players to engage in the age-old battle for three-in-a-row supremacy. And I hosted it on Hostinger with Custom Domain.

Visit Tic Tac Toe
